description_en: Sliding increases your affinity for a short time.

effects.description_en: Increases affinity by 30% for a short time after sliding.

description_en: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.

effects.description_en: While active, grants attack +4 and increases affinity by 3%.
While active, grants attack +8 and increases affinity by 6%.
While active, grants attack +12 and increases affinity by 9%.
While active, grants attack +16 and increases affinity by 12%.
While active, grants attack +20 and increases affinity by 15%.

description_en: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.
Strengthens explosive attacks like gunlance shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and sticky ammo.

effects.description_en: Increases power of each attack by 10% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 15%.
Increases power of each attack by 20% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 30%.
Increases power of each attack by 30% and reduces Wyvern's Fire cooldown by 50%.

description_en: Increases attack power. Also improves affinity at higher levels.
Improves mobility in water.

effects.description_en: Prevents water from slowing movement and improves evasion while in water.
Prevents water from slowing movement and greatly improves evasion while in water.

description_en: Improves your skill at cooking meat.

effects.description_en: Makes it easier to cook well-done steaks.

description_en: Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Grants protection against blastblight.

effects.description_en: Delays blastblight and reduces blast damage.
Greatly delays blastblight and greatly reduces blast damage.

description_en: Grants protection against bleeding.
Grants protection against all elemental blights.

effects.description_en: Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 30%.
Reduces the duration of all elemental blights by 60%.

description_en: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.

effects.description_en: Increases the success rate of flash effects.

description_en: Increases the damage of explosive items.
Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.

effects.description_en: One extra consumable herb item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, or seed item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, or insect item per gather.
One extra consumable herb, fruit, nut, seed, insect, or mushroom item per gather.

description_en: Increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.
Prevents knockback from attacks while carving.
Decreases stamina depletion when evading while clinging to walls or ivy.

effects.description_en: Reduces stamina depletion while climbing by 25%.

description_en: Reduces stamina depletion when performing stamina-draining moves such as evading, etc.
Increases the damage of critical hits.

effects.description_en: Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 30%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 35%.
Increases damage dealt by critical hits by 40%.

description_en: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks.
Increases affinity.
Increases defense. Level up to improve resistances as well.
Shows rare gathering points on the Wildlife Map.

effects.description_en: Marks rare sites on the wildlife map.

description_en: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.

effects.description_en: While active, reduces damage taken by 15%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 30%.
While active, reduces damage taken by 50%.

description_en: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Makes monsters hit with slinger dung pods more likely to run.

effects.description_en: Makes slinger dung pods more effective at making monsters run away.

description_en: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.

effects.description_en: Slightly reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Reduces the effects of weak monster roars.
Nullifies weak monster roars and reduces the effects of strong monster roars.
Nullifies weak and strong monster roars.

description_en: Gain a resistance to effluvial buildup.
Nullifies or reduces environmental damage in the Rotten Vale.

effects.description_en: Nullifies damage from effluvia and reduces damage from acids.

description_en: Decreases the chances of destroying the bodies of small insect monsters, allowing them to be carved.

effects.description_en: Increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Greatly increases the chances of a corpse being left behind.
Makes it so corpses will always be left behind.

description_en: Increases evade distance.
Extends the invulnerability period when evading.
Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.

effects.description_en: Prevents standard knockbacks. Tripping is reduced to a knockback instead.

description_en: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

effects.description_en: Increases gauge fill rate by 5% and reduces charge times by 5%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 10% and reduces charge times by 10%.
Increases gauge fill rate by 20% and reduces charge times by 20%.

description_en: Increases the chance of finding rare gathering points.

effects.description_en: Increases the likelihood of rare gathering points respawning.

description_en: Increases your attack and defense every time you fall in battle. (This effect can stack twice.)

effects.description_en: Increases attack by 10% and defense by 15% with each use.

description_en: Unlocks your weapon's hidden element. Also increases bowgun loading capacity. (There is a cap to loading capacity.)

effects.description_en: Draws out 33% of hidden element and expands clip size for some ammo.
Draws out 66% of hidden element and expands clip size for many ammo.
Draws out 100% of hidden element and expands clip size for most ammo.

description_en: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.
Increases the number of times you can use a gathering point.

effects.description_en: Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles and special item gathering points.
Allows you to gather one extra time from bonepiles, gathering points, and mining outcrops.

description_en: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

effects.description_en: Very slightly decreases the impact of attacks.
Slightly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stmina depletion by 15%.
Greatly decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 15%.
Grearly decreases the imapct of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
Massively decreases the impact of attacks and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

description_en: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.
Increases health.
Nullifies damage from heat.
Increases the firepower of ballistae and cannons.
Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.
Increases the quantity of honey you receive when gathering in the field.
Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies.

effects.description_en: Extends melody effect duration and increases health recovery.

description_en: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.

effects.description_en: Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 30%.
Extends the time until your stamina cap decreases by 60%.
Prevents your stamina cap from decreasing.

description_en: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Reduces the chances small monsters will attack after spotting you. (No effect on certain monsters.)

effects.description_en: Discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Highly discourages monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.
Prevents monsters from engaging you even if you've been spotted.

description_en: Grants protection against Defense Down.

effects.description_en: Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 30%,
Reduces the duration of Defense Down by 60%.

description_en: Extends the duration of some item effects.
Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.
Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.

effects.description_en: While active, increases affinity by 10% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 20% and reduces stamina depletion by 10%.
While active, increases affinity by 30% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 40% and reduces stamina depletion by 30%.
While active, increases affinity by 50% and reduces stamina depletion by 50%.

description_en: Alows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters, and extends the dive-evade distance.
Slows down stamina depletion for actions which continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).
Improves your skill at fishing.

effects.description_en: Increases the time window for reeling in fish, and makes it easier to catch large fish.

description_en: Allows you to gather more quickly, and also prevents attacks from knocking you back while gathering.

effects.description_en: Speeds up gathering and prevents knockbacks while gathering.

description_en: Makes it easier to mount monsters.

effects.description_en: Makes it easier to mount monsters and down mounted monsters.

description_en: Increases affinity when stamina is full.
Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.

effects.description_en: Lets you digest blue mushrooms and toadstools.
Additionally lets you digest nitroshrooms and parashrooms.
Additionally lets you digest mandragoras, devil's blight, and exciteshrooms.

description_en: Reduces impairments to mobility while stuck in monster muck.

effects.description_en: Reduces limits on movement speed and evasion.

description_en: Powers up non-elemental weapons you have equipped.

effects.description_en: Raises base attack for non-elemental weapons.

description_en: Increases the attack power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

effects.description_en: Increases the power of normal ammo and normal arrows.

description_en: Powers up Palicoes.

effects.description_en: Increases Palico attack power and defense by 5%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 10%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 15%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 20%.
Increases Palico attack power and defense by 25%.

description_en: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Reduces the duration of paralysis.

effects.description_en: Reduces the duration of paralysis by 30%.
Reduces the duration of paralysis by 60%.

description_en: Makes it easier to break or sever parts of large monsters.
Increases attack when your health is full.
Increases the attack power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

effects.description_en: Increases the power of piercing ammo and Dragon Piercer.

description_en: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Allows you to apply poison coatings.
Grants protection against the effects of poison.

effects.description_en: Reduces the duration of poison by 30%.
Reduces the duration of poison by 60%.

description_en: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.
Increases your speed while transporting items and decreases the likelihood of dropping them,

effects.description_en: Increases movement speed while transporting and reduces downtime on landings.

description_en: Speeds up weapon sheating.
Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the health gauge).

effects.description_en: Doubles the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Triples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.
Quadruples the speed at which you heal recoverable damage.

description_en: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.
Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your health gauge).
Improves evasion and reduces stamina depletion when afflicted with abnormal status effects.

effects.description_en: While active, greatly improves evasion invulnerability time and reduces stamina depletion.

description_en: Increases your scoutflies' gauge fill rate when you find tracks and other traces left by monsters.
Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations. (Effect is applied at the quest results screen.)

effects.description_en: Speeds up progress on research levels and special investigations.

description_en: Expands your scoutflies' detection range.
Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Elemental buildup has a maximum limit.)
Reduces the duration of sleep.

effects.description_en: Reduces the duration of sleep by 30%.
Reduces the duration of sleep by 60%.

description_en: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo obtained in the field.

effects.description_en: Increases the loading capacity for slinger ammo collected from the ground or plants.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for some slinger ammo dropped by monsters.
In addition, increases the loading capacity for all slinger ammo dropped by monsters.

description_en: Makes it easier to stun monsters.
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer.

effects.description_en: Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 10%.
Increases the power of bowgun special ammo and Dragon Piercer by 20%.

description_en: Increases movement speed while crouching.
Increases meat-eating and item-consumption speed.
Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

effects.description_en: Removes one cycle from the sharpening process.
Removes two cycles from the sharpening process.
Removes three cycles from the sharpening process.

description_en: Recover health when using sporepuffs.
Increases the attack power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

effects.description_en: Increases the power of spread ammo and power shot arrows.

description_en: Speeds up stamina recovery.
Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.
Makes it easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

effects.description_en: Makes it slightly easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it moderately easier for monsters to lose sight of you.
Makes it much easier for monsters to lose sight of you.

description_en: Reduces stun duration.

effects.description_en: Reduces the duration of stun by 30%.
Reduces the duration of stun by 60%.

description_en: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.
Grants protection against ground tremors.

effects.description_en: Nullifies minor ground tremors and reduces the effects of major ground tremors.
Nullifies minor and major ground tremors.

description_en: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)
Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster weak spot.

effects.description_en: Attacks that hit weak spots have 15% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 30% increased affinity.
Attacks that hit weak spots have 50% increased affinity.

description_en: Sllows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.

effects.description_en: Items affect nearby allies with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius with 33% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a wider radius at 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with 66% of their efficacy.
Items affect nearby allies in a much wider radius with full efficacy.

description_en: Grants protection against wind pressure.

effects.description_en: Slightly reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Reduces the effects of minor wind pressure.
Negates minor wind pressure and reduces the effects of major wind pressure.
Negates minor and major wind pressure.
